name: Grave Drive | 2d Car Game
description:
I bought this HTML5 Game, then I built a desktop app, and I converted it to a desktop app, the game is available offline and without ads.

Grave Drive is a fun new side driving game, in which you will be attempting to reach the finish line of each level, as fast as you can while collecting gold coins. 8 levels and two different locations, enjoy and good luck!
